subject: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic - reg.
text: MRd <54 rTHTfqferasrut (Tsw5 GRdev & TTHN #1T4, IRT TRTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) #4 T4tt 5-5 Qa 6, #dz7-10, E1VT, 78 faorlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 T /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Atmanirbhar Bharat/2o22 Policy Circular No.18.85/ 2022 dated 05th December, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No_ NHAI/COVID-19 /RoadMap / CMD/2020 (Comp. No. 5788)} Sub.: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic- reg: MoRTH vide Letter No: COVID-19/RoadMap/ JS(H)/2020 (18377) dated 01.12.2022 on the subject mentioned above has provided some relief measures for a period of 5 months from 01.11.2022 to 31.03.2023. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation. 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above H22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQV ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation: 'M T 7 9 NHAI New Copy
